ai-patthana18.16:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.16:1.1_0: For this teaching is not based on the teaching, nor no cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.16:2.1_0: For it is not only because of one’s defilements that gives rise to the cause,
ai-patthana18.16:3.1_0: ‘There are four supports for the sake of surveying the object, it is undisturbed in all the world.’ ...
